header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Software engineer with 6+ years of experience building and maintaining large-scale distributed systems and messaging infrastructure. Proven expertise processing billions of events through AWS services, designing robust CI/CD pipelines, and implementing monitoring solutions for high-throughput services. Strong background in DevOps practices, cloud architecture, and cross-functional collaboration in fast-paced environments. Experience with both functional programming paradigms and enterprise-scale event-driven architectures.
